title: Bioenergetics for endurance (simple guide)
excerpt: A simple model of ATP supply: phosphagen, glycolytic, and oxidative systems â€” and what that means for training.
body:
## The only model you need at the start

You always produce ATP. The question is: **how fast**, and **for how long**.

- **Very fast, very short:** phosphagen system
- **Fast, short-to-medium:** glycolysis
- **Slower, long duration:** oxidative system

## Training implication

Most endurance progress is: build aerobic base + add a bit of high intensity carefully.

comments.author: Coach
comments.message: Thanks for digging into the basics!
